Articles.Content: Since the Fuel Wings has become outdated there has not yet been a stable wing fuel mod until Wetter Wings. Therefore, just wondering if there is any plan by anyone to keep the Wetter Wings mod updated? It indeed makes long-distance cargo flights much easier.
It a ModuleManager patch.   Was released for 1.6, no reason why it went work in 1.7
yeah I'm using it just fine in 1.6.1.
This thread has been moved to add on discussions.
